overview: Pál Schäfer is 22 years old. His school-leaving exam didn't go well, so now he works for his father's washing machine repair company. Nóra Abonyi is 25 and a half years old. She always wanted to be a painter, but now she works for a tattoo salon. None of them had luck in love before, but one-day Pál found a colourful stone in the riverside.
title: The Stone
